website_summaries.verdict: Attractive frosted display and energy-saving features. The least expensive model available.
pros: The soft style of this model suits most homes, and the plastic casing is of good quality
Saves energy by optimizing usage based on your schedule
cons: Does not display time and date as other models do
A few customers reported defective models

website_summaries.verdict: The Thermostat E is almost as smart as Nest's other model  -- and all for 80 bucks less.
pros: Plastic hardware makes Nest's $169 Thermostat E more affordable, but it has most of the same smarts as the pricier Learning Thermostat
cons: The Thermostat E has a low-resolution screen, it doesn't support Nest's "Farsight" display and it isn't compatible with quite as many HVAC systems as the original
Nest thermostats still don't come with remote temperature sensors

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well once allowenses for the errors  in temperature measurement are made.
customer_reviews.text: Tends to measure temperature 1.5 to 2°C higher than reality. Took quite a while to get the home/away to work.
customer_reviews.author: HarryS

customer_reviews.title: Seller never replies!! Want to return but not responding to my request now it’s past the 30days!!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to return this item as not compatible, but seller won’t respond to help!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with 120 or 240 v systems
customer_reviews.text: Be sure your thermostat hookup is only 24 v. This product will not work with 120 or 240 v systems, which I might add are NOT unusual. I found this out after I received it. It would have been helpful if that were specified in the product description. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle user

customer_reviews.title: Wall plate was helpful for wide thermostat replacement...
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, was done in 30 minutes. Wall plate included was very helpful since I was replacing an older Honeywell wide thermostat. Check your local energy companies for rebates, Centerpoint in MN is offering $50 rebates right now for WiFi connected thermostats.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Worked less than two months
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this in late November. At first it worked well but on a Sunday in January, when the high was 3 degrees F, the new furnace would not run. We placed an after hours service call ($$$) and the tech determined that the thermostat was stuck in a delay loop. The delay is intended to prevent wear on the furnace but, in our case, it would restart as soon as the timer got to zero therefore never sending a call to the furnace for heat. The service tech replaced the thermostat with the cheapest he had and the furnace started right away. It was a cold and costly issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jean R

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the headache, stay away!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and set up with Alexa, but it was all downhill from there. It started heating the house and wouldn’t stop. Even turned off, the heat kept rolling. Kept the whole house awake (my husband, my two year old, my four year old, and nine-month-pregnant me) all night long, the kids because they were so hot and my husband and i both because of the heat and because of a growing concern about a fire. Tech support was useless. Was a Christmas present for my husband that I regret entirely, can’t express my disappointment enough.
customer_reviews.author: Megan E. Pereira

customer_reviews.title: This thing did not last
customer_reviews.text: It failed November 3, 2019. That is not long enough for a thermostat. I feel that it is not a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Novak

customer_reviews.title: Great budget alternative to Nest 2/3
customer_reviews.text: I have owned my Nest E for 1 week now. Installation was a breeze (less than 15 mins) and setup equally as simple. I only have a single stage system, so nothing complex there. Love the pre-cooling feature that allows you to set a temperature for a certain time. Included wall plate was useful to cover up unpainted area under 17yr old thermostat. My only complaint is the low resolution of the display, but after a $100 rebate from my gas company, I think I can live with that for $69. :)
customer_reviews.author: seekinsp

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and I love being able to adjust my thermostat remotely. No I am not a bot, yes this is a real review. Penis.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Not really compatible with two wire heat even though it says so
customer_reviews.text: I have a two wire heat only steam radiator system and this was suppose to be compatible based on the Nest app/site/manual... Everything worked fine for a few weeks, but now there is a constant error about no power going through the R wire E195 error code. After puzzling over this.. I learnt on research that it doesnt get enough power from the R wire, so it was ok when charged, but doesnt work properly without the C wire. Nest should not have claimed this is compatible when it is not really... I need to go back to my old battery powered programmable thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check Wiring Before You Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not connect your nest without a common wire! Mine worked for a few months and then fried my circuit board in my furnace. HVAC had to be serviced in the middle of the night and put me in the hole $450! Thankful I could return it to amazon and at least get my money back on the product so I could afford to make a payment for the repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Knudtson

customer_reviews.title: Install/setup is easy and it works as described
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy setup and install. I verified on the Google nest website prior to purchasing it that it would work in our home. It doesn't have all the bells and whistles like the more advanced version but it does what we need. My husband had it installed in about 30 minutes and it took me another 15 minutes to complete the setup. It works well with our alexas but we set up the thermostat on a schedule for the entire week and it so far has stuck to that schedule flawlessly. We've had this thermostat set up for about 2 weeks now and so far it's been perfect but I will update if issues occur.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M. Furry

customer_reviews.title: Poor tech support
customer_reviews.text: I installed the wires as indicated. My furnace would not turn on... kept getting error code. I called tech support and wasted over an hour with them via online chat. They confirmed wires attached "correctly". Finally, since it is winter in Wisconsin, I had to call a furnace company to come trouble shoot. He moved the wires around to OTHER THAN WHAT TECH support told me. Then it worked. I wash charged $100 for the service call. Easy to install or self-explanatory? Not so much.
customer_reviews.author: brian a pizon

customer_reviews.title: Nest is Easy Peasey.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install as a DYI project. Took about an hour altogether. Thermostat unit itself is easy to set up. iPhone App is intuitive and easy to use. Love the scheduling matrix. NOT able to integrate with Alexa. I have done everything as instructed, but Alexa just will not “discover” the Nest. Now, in fairness, I have not called tech support to work thru this issue ... maybe it can be configured to work. Thing is I have no connected “zones” so frankly I don’t think I would use Alexa anyway ... the iPhone App provides all “connected” functionality I had hoped for. All-in-all happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Used and defective sold as new
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, absolutely Horrible, we received not one but two used / broken thermostats. This is unacceptable, when we don’t have ac due to a broken thermostat. When purchasing a new item everything should be intact including the seal on the litter box. Our first unit has already been installed on someone’s wall. The screws were covered in drywall material. The box cover panel was all scratched up and the base plate had damage from the screw being tightened. We had the item replaced and go figure the second seal was broken too. All of the items were all jumbled around in the box. Do yourself the favor and do curbside pick up from Best Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Temp shown on Nest is higher than actual
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to having the ability to program, and monitor the temperature in my home when away. Not long after installation I noticed that temperature shown on the Nest did not match another thermostat in the same room. Also noticed that it seemed like the AC was on all the time. I disabled the wifi and now the Nest seems to match the indoor temperature, but cannot monitor and change the temperature through the app. This defeats the purpose why I bought this in the first place. I would not recommend and would find another smart device through another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Must have for hands free
customer_reviews.text: I've been prepping my home for our little new arrival. Temperature control was a must upgrade for my home. This thing is amazing with the integration with all the google home products. While we are out I can set the temperature from anywhere so by the time we come back home its at the perfect temperature for my family. Easiest installation I have done by far. Diagram provided in the box will really help you from switching from the traditional honeywell gauges to this nest product. Very easy to control on google minis and your smart phones.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and attach to the wall, a headache to wire.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this device. It's very clean looking and easy to use, easy to attach it to the wall, but unnecessarily difficult to obtain wiring instructions. The instructions say to go to a website, enter your old thermostat's used wire labels, then a custom wiring diagram would appear. This didn't happen for me. I tried several times and could not get a diagram to appear, instead a new page would give me a few options --- products and services to purchase. This was annoying enough, then I spent about 3 hours chatting with customer service trying to get the thing wired and working.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Total Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself the worthless headache of this nightmare. Would not turn on the fan blower automatically with temp changed on the thermostat. Had to find a blog with all kinds of twists and turns to resolve that. Tech support is available 24/7 with relatively short wait times but follow a tight script. With something this complicated you’ll never find resolution. I finally fixed the fan blower issue but now the app constantly says disconnected but the actual thermostat reads connected. Both the ping and WiFi signal are appropriate as is the battery level. This is just a total nightmare
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.....Superior customer support people
customer_reviews.text: I’m that little lady senior citizen that find anything that has to do with tools something I can’t do successfully. However I watched the video and called when I was lost. The customer service people are the most patient 800 advisors I’ve ever spoken to. The first thing he did was to assure me that he would stay on the phone with me until we got it right.....and he did. It is so convenient especially since Alexa is connected and she knows every thing. Additionally you can save that $75-100 installation charged by the hvac serviceman. My heat pump system seems to work more effenciently. Can’t wait to compare it to last years bills.
customer_reviews.author: GrandDiva

customer_reviews.title: I’m into it!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough about this nest E. I put of buying the other generations of nest because I felt it was just a little too expensive. The price came down for this one and although the parts are mostly plastic, I think I like the look of this one better anyway. So easy to install if you’re the least bit handy. The software setup is also very simple. Once it’s running the interface is refreshingly straightforward. I really can’t say enough about this product. Even besides the high tech look and feel of the nest, it’s just easy to use and I’m looking forward to being able to look at my energy useage.
customer_reviews.author: RogerL

customer_reviews.title: Good product but no technical support
customer_reviews.text: We purchased multiple Nest thermostats. All of them except one installed relatively easily. The Nest Learning Thermostat failed to connect to the Nest mobile App. The thermostat successfully connected to Wifi. We left multiple messages on Google's Nest community help board but didn't get a response for days. Once they responded they simply recited the same useless information which was online. "Reset the device and try again." After doing that multiple times we just left the thermostat connected to Wifi but frankly that reduces the value of the product. Bottom line: terrible support. Be advised that if you have issues you are on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Dotti

customer_reviews.title: This cheaper unit is a disaster.
customer_reviews.text: We have three Nest thermostats, one regular one and two of E models, one works but disconnects all the time. In addition to the three thermostats we have three remote temperature sensors and a smoke alarm. The second E model we bought took four days to charge, then lost the charge and took two more days to charge. About every 10 days it fails and has to be reset. The real problem is that tech support has been destroyed after Google bought the Nest line. It is impossible to get support and attempt to get a replacement. We will not be buying anymore Nest products or Alexa enabled anything.
customer_reviews.author: Bytebank

customer_reviews.title: Never powered up
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed...Product never powered up. It took me several weeks to get this installed, so I’m past the point of getting a refund. My advice is that you install it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Shortcycled the AC
customer_reviews.text: Install seemed easy and then at 4am the relay was clicking rapidly and short cycling the whole AC. Put in the original $15 Honeywell thermostat and no issues. Had a professional (Nest approved) out twice and after multiple hours of trying he said this was a common issue. For a device with a lot of bells and whistles it fails to perform its main task. Save yourself the headache.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't have purchased this this product except that my RadioThermostat had an issue and once it was disabled, I could get it set up again. Setting it up was terribly difficult. After wasting a lot of time, I purchased the Nest E and set up was comparatively simple. It's a much more attractive looking thermostat. I like the motion detector activation and the furnished wall plate that covers the mounting holes where the old RadioThermostat was located. Also the lighted display. Like the RadioThermostat when it was working, it's great to be able to check on house temperatures while away on vacation, or to change the temperature settings remotely if desirable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Nest
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed emotions about this product. First, it was super easy to install, if you can follow directions, you can install this. The problem I had was at night, it sensed no activity, thinking no one at home, it raised the threshold for the air. I live in Texas, its hot here, I do not need my thermostat turning off in the middle of the night. There is a feature you can disable to supposedly stop this from happening but it did not help in my case. I went back to my traditional thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: debbied038

customer_reviews.title: Stay away, far far away.
customer_reviews.text: Biggest piece of trash I've ever purchased. I owned the regular nest thermostat for years, only issue was that annoying feature that changed the temperature while I was sleeping. This piece of trash never read the correct temperature and would take 1.5hrs to cool from 72 degrees, all the way down to 72 degrees. I put my old thermostat on and have never been happier. If I didn't want my money back, I'd smash this POS against the tree in my backyard and celebrate by ceremoniously burning the remains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a toss up..
customer_reviews.text: I really like this nest, my only grievance is that the app disconnects from the until ALL THE TIME. This is frustrating because that wad the sike purpose of me purchasing this nest. To change the temperature without having to get up! It has been 2 weeks, it worked the first few days and hit and miss there after. Hopefully it will get better. Other than that, I'm pleased. Because of COVID, I've been home so it's not a huge deal, but in the future when I'm not home, I'm hoping the app will stay connected.
customer_reviews.author: LaCheryl Ivy

customer_reviews.title: If you’re thinking about buying it- just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I live with tenants I rent out to, nobody agrees on the temperature of the house so the thermostat was on and off, my bills were through the roof. It was a little tricky to install even with clear instructions, maybe my house is old idk. But now that it has been running for a month I put a lock between 72 and 80F which has saved me the drama with tenants. It has an eco setting, gets to know you, figured out how to use less energy which is insane! Very happy with the thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Worst thermostat I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my house. Such a terrribly designed product. The learning feature is a joke and is difficult to override. Then there are the very very basic features that even the cheapest thermostat has, but this one does not. You cannot program the temperature swing differential. It is set for 2 degrees and cannot be changed. This means your home will get colder than you want and then get hotter than you want. Totally uncomfortable. Silly design. Buying two new Honeywell Alexa enabled thermostats instead. Shameful Nest/Google.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Carp

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: 1 con on this is I do not have a predicatable schedule. So I've turned off the auto scheduling that learns your schedule. Think this is great feature for the other 90% of the population though. 2nd con is color selection. As this unit was going into basement, no biggie. But would have loved to pick a darker ring theme. Works great with google nest and android. Install was very easy. Took 5 minutes to remove the old mercury thermostat an replace with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: D0M

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermostat & Easy To Set Up and Use
customer_reviews.text: It literally took me less than 10 minutes to get this on the wall, connected and online. I was able to connect this my Burnham Alpine boiler in no time. All I needed to use was the existing 2 wire set up. Connected the white wire to the W1 connector and the red wire to the R connector. Went through the automated steps in the thermostat and it came right up. I did not need to connect a 3rd wire for the common connection. Looks great and easy to use. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond 3rd

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my NEST components.
customer_reviews.text: I strongly recommend doing your homework before you install this thermostat. Make sure it's compatible with your AC / Heating system. There's a quick guide on the NEST site that will ask you questions about your system and will tell you if it's compatible. The physical installation was not a problem. I did have an issue with setting it up with my NEST app. Even after I scanned the code, I could not get the unit to give me its key code. I had to look at the back of the unit and manually enter the code. Once that was done it worked like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: copterdok

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, was done in 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, was done in 30 minutes. Wall plate included was very helpful since I was replacing an older Honeywell wide thermostat. Check your local energy companies for rebates, NY is offering rebates right now for WiFi connected thermostat (must be installed by contractor)
customer_reviews.author: E. Lk

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my parents. They love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Gen 2 full color Nest and I really like it. My parents wanted one, but this one fit my budget so I went with it. They love it. We installed it no problem and they have a home built in the 70's. As far as I can tell it shares all the same features as my full color one. This one just has a much more subtle display which for a thermostat is great. They've been using it since late December now and say it's been wonderful to manage from their phones.
customer_reviews.author: Count Scotula

customer_reviews.title: Good product but do A LOT of homework first
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work to replace an old mercury switch. I dont know if its because it just wasn't compatible even though they said it was or if its because the clip was loose. Tech support wasn't very helpful either. It more than doubled my daily energy usage because it wouldn't shut off right. We were afraid it would burn out the compressor so it was returned for a full refund. We live in AZ so its important to have reliable ac in the summer. Its a great idea but doesn't work for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Easy install easy use best thermostat I’ve used.
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty basic furnace setup and had reviewed how this new nest was a good fit for this type of application. I replaced a touchscreen non connected thermostat that worked fine but wasn’t the easiest to adjust. I sat down with my nest yesterday to reinstall thinking this would be a 2 hour affair. Nope easy install that took maybe 15 min. The new nest thermostat was easy to connect, setup and use. I like the white understated color and am happy the nest cam with the adapter cover plate so it was a clean swap. With the $75 rebate from my energy provider this purchase was a no brained.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: Had for about 2 weeks now. Works fine, easy install and the APP is good and easy to use for programming (asks for a lot of permissions). I have 2 external thermometers next to it and the Nest read roughly 1- 1.5 degrees warmer so had to adjust for it. I dont like that the display is not always on and you need to walk by or wave your hand in front of it for display to come on. Would not have bought it unless there was a $100 rebate and even then it seems expensive for a thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Y.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Customer service = horrible
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat works fantastic when functional. In my circumstance, it caused havoc on my A/C system. Bills were nearly double previous amounts. I contacted Amazon support and they just pawned me off to Nest. Contacted Nest and they were ZERO help. They refused to refund me or send me replacement. 0/10 would NOT recommend. Save the money or get a different, trusted brand. Very disappointed with Amazon customer service on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P.

customer_reviews.title: ... upgrading my house and was looking to get a smart thermostat. I have been looking at the Nest ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been slowly upgrading my house and was looking to get a smart thermostat. I have been looking at the Nest Thermostat and was just trying to justify the almost $300 dollars at the time. When Nest announced the Thermostat E, I was excited. Read online reviews, and you will see that really everything you need a smart thermostat to do, the E does it. It doesn't have all the features of its big brother, but I found it is not lacking in anything I need. I love being able to set it from my phone or Echo. It was easy to install. And the $100 dollar rebate made it a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Apparently a Common Problem
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE - THE DEVICE ONLY STAYED CONNECTED TO THE APP FOR 48 HOURS. I CHECKED MY HOME NETWORK AND IT IS SHOWING TO BE CONNECTED TO THE HOME NETWORK. THERE IS SOMETHING WRONG WITH THE APP THAT IT KEEPS REGISTERING THAT IT IS OFF LINE. AFTER READING SEVERAL REVIEWS THAT ARE VERY RECENT, THIS APPARENTLY IS A COMMON ISSUE. WHEN I STARTED TO LOOK AT THE PAPERWORK IN THE BOX THE REPLACEMENT THEY SENT ME WAS A REFURBISHED ITEM. I PURCHASED A NEW ITEM AND EXPECTED THE REPLACEMENT TO BE THE SAME. I’M SO DISAPPOINTED WITH NEST AND WILL NOT BE PURCHASING ANYTHING ELSE FROM THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Check your furnace & model!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install & setup. I don't have a C wire & this said you didn't need one! It ran fine for 30 seconds on A/C then stopped blowing. A/C unit kept running but apartment kept getting hotter. Finally after working with tech support it was determined I needed a C wire. I returned it and had my $ back in 2 days. I'm giving it 2 stars because it was very easy to install & setup. If you have a C wire it will probably be great.
customer_reviews.author: thereelguy1965

customer_reviews.title: Does not work without C wire!
customer_reviews.text: This product specifically says it is compatible with therrmostats without a C wire (for non-techy people, that means your old thermostat is likely battery operated because it doesn't have power connected to it directly). THAT IS FALSE. I've spent over $100 on HVC technicians to come out and install new wires because it is totally incompatible with my system, even though Nest support and websites specifically say it's compatible. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Lonna Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Worked for first couple of weeks.....
customer_reviews.text: Well, it was a neat gadget to replace my old thermostat for the first couple of weeks. Then.....lost WIFI connection and will it reconnect after multiple attempts and resets. Looking it up, it looks like this is a common issue. So - not worth the $
customer_reviews.author: Brian Blair

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product for home automation.
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat replaced a basic Honeywell thermostat in our living room. Installation was as simple as it gets. Remove the old wires from the old thermostat and plug them into the identified clip on the Nest thermostat. Took about 15 minutes to install. Then, took me another ten minutes to get it integrated with my Alexa app. Temperature control is simple and accurate. I could not be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jan B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: It acts like it's going to work but it doesn't. I looked online and I had an AC guy take a look all to no avail. If you go to their website there doesn't appear to be anyway to get a refund or warranty coverage either. Only a copy of their manual. There probably is a way but I'll have to hunt for it or make calls or something. I was so looking forward to having this work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unit dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I have had several of the original nest thermostats no problems. I purchased this one for my attic the e model because of the price. I hooked up all the wires to the base and I get a error message saying no power from r wire. I put back my old thermostat and everything is fine. I call Amazon to try to get a replacement they tell me I have to go through google customer service. Good luck trying to get someone on the phone or online chat
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable arrogance
customer_reviews.text: Temperature settings are done by schedule and you cannot change the schedule. And when you want heat or cool, they come on with a two hour delay. Maybe some people like having Google software control their household temperature with no way to manually override - but not me. This is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: What I did not like about this product was that it kept my heat running abnormally more than regular thermostat. I turned off all the extra settings and features but still continued to run. My go back to traditional thermostat in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonguy6996

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install, no need for common wire!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed at how easy these were to install, and the fact they did not need a common wire to power on. Using one with our in-floor radiant heat, and the other with our garage furnace. Both work well. My only suggestion for Nest/Google, is to allow the "Lock" feature to control whether the thermostat is on or off. Currently the "lock" feature only allows a set range of temperatures (minimum temperature 50 degrees) and if the furnace is off, the user can turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: May be fake
customer_reviews.text: Hate to write this review because the Nest support has been very helpful throughout the process. The Nest E came in with battery fully drained, I had to charge it with the USB cable for 2 hr before I can set it up. This is my third Nest and never had a problem. And then, the Nest would not find wifi and would not connect to the app. I was on the phone with Nest and finally, they sent a replacement. The Nest E that came from this selling does not have the Nest logo on the front button. It makes me wonder if it's a fake or different version then the one Nest/Google are selling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor product and suport
customer_reviews.text: poor product and support Thermostat will not stay connected to the app so to me that is totally unreliable The sports seams to be lost can not tell you what is wrong with it Now i can not get it returned from amazon a total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Richard Weyland

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used to have the more expensive nest thermostat in a place we were renting, needed to decide which one to get in our new home. This works just as well as the nicer one, and I like the white modern look of it. The screen is basic but works fine, don’t see a need for my thermostat to have a tv screen. *Check to see if you have a common (C) wire before buying* We did have a C wire so installation was a breeze. Took maybe 10 min tops. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great thermostat, except for the WiFi function
customer_reviews.text: Every function of this thermostat works great, except for the fact that it never stays connected to our Wi-Fi. And I know this is an issue with just our Wi-Fi because I have seen this issue all over the Internet with this model of Nest. If they would fix this this is five stars easy, we have saved so much money since we started using it and I feel like her house is cooler and more comfortable most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need three wires for installation
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to having this new thermostat in our home. But our oil company tried to install it, and discovered that not only would it need three wires, but when they tried running the third wire, they discovered that too many beams were in the way. We would have had to get an electrician to install it, and it would have required cutting into our walls. That would have made for a MUCH more expensive installation! So we went for an easier option which is also compatible with our Alexa and Google Home.
customer_reviews.author: Luella B. Pinelli

customer_reviews.title: Was great until..
customer_reviews.text: This thing was awesome at first but I had to call tech support to help install it. Now months later it’s reading the incorrect room temperature and I’ve tried everything to fix it. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up. Integrated with Alexa even easier.
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at how easy and quickly the set up was. We have central air/heat. We integrated to Alexa immediately and this has been such a nice feature to use. We set up the weekly schedule and now the heat/cool air is at a constant temperature we enjoy. No batteries needed for this unit. We used a C-wire although it’s not required with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: BLT

customer_reviews.title: Not as compatible as they say
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy enough until you flip the breakers back on and - nothing. You dig through their online troubleshooting until you find an item that says remove the common wire. And it works. Until a couple of weeks ago. Turns out the unit, with the common wire removed, draws power for itself in a way that causes the main circuit board in your central AC to slowly burn out while starting and stopping the AC itself. In a nutshell, let's see if all I have is a previous gen (Nov, 2019 - sheesh) and all it needs is a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tashman

customer_reviews.title: Newly installed, working so far...
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this and everything seems to be going... okay. Went from an ancient mercury thermostat to this one, so I’m kinda outta my element so far. Installation was everything I was promised. As easy/difficult as replacing any thermostat would be, depending on your skill level. Read a bunch and talked to my furnace guy (you have one, right?) and they all suggested I connect the command wire, even though Nest instructions say it isn’t particularly necessary. Make sure you get your rebate from you lower company (if applicable). Me, I have $100 coming back to me.
customer_reviews.author: John MC

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity issues.
customer_reviews.text: Unit continually goes offline in the app. Nest still shows it’s connected to WiFi and only way to fix it is to restart the Nest. Biggest feature I wanted was being able to control my thermostat remotely and if that doesn’t work what’s the point?
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Love it and want more!
customer_reviews.text: So far so great, I love these. Right now I am only using through the Nest app which I love, looks much more intuitive and seamless than the Google Home app, which looks like a nerd made it, BUT does work well. These work great on my older, heat only, oil baseboard furnace with NO c-wire. It gets enough juice off of the 2 lines running to it :)
customer_reviews.author: PA Dad

customer_reviews.title: Sucks so far.
customer_reviews.text: I installed my nest at home and it was great so I decided to by a thermostat E for one for a family member, and what a pain. The thing at first connected to the wifi, but I pulled it out to reconnect and it wouldn't find any wifi signal for anything. Factory reset didn't help. My phone and laptop could find the signal, but it couldn't. Just returned it.
customer_reviews.author: jmtruck

customer_reviews.title: Not as SIMPLE as they make it seem.
customer_reviews.text: The item did not come with a charged battery. This caused the "simple" installation to take a day. The battery does not charge in an hour. It took over night. All and all it works but I was highly disappointed at first.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Benzenberg

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to use too.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install because my son-in-law installed it and integrated to my Alexa and phone. He had installed one similar at his own house. We got it so I could turn up the heat or ac when we arrive at the airport and then the house isn't so cold or hot Used it once all ready and it was great!
customer_reviews.author: M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I had a gen 2 in my old hous and got this for another house. Even though it is cheaper, still works great. Almost identical functionality, just a lower key interface. I like that is blends in better than the gen 2 would have. In my area there are rebates totaling $125, so it is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps my best hi-tech purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Easy installation, elegant design, easy-to-learn user interface, & I can control my thermostats from literally anywhere in the world (as long as I can get a wifi or cell signal). Most importantly, I can now control my upstairs thermostat from downstairs & vice versa. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the higher end Nest
customer_reviews.text: We had the other Nest thermostat in our previous home (the one with the silver disk), and purchased this one when we moved. It works just as great and was super easy to install ourselves. Extra bonus, our electric utility company sent us a rebate after installation to make the cost even more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Carras

customer_reviews.title: Yes-technology done right
customer_reviews.text: I use this with Google Home, replacing an old school thermostat with no c wire for a secondary zone. Works like a charm. I had a little problem getting it set up, but a call to Nest customer service solved my problems fairly quickly. So worth it over mechanical thermostats. Not a gimmick - it works and is far better than older models.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey John

customer_reviews.title: Time to become a bigger couch potato
customer_reviews.text: Pretty crazy how we went from having to get up in change the temperature to now just telling your Alexa device to set the temperature do whatever you want. Insulation is super easy, I like the design, and there's really nothing bad to say about this product. Can't ask for much more, helping my lazy lifestyle for sure.
customer_reviews.author: rahul

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR ELECTRIC 240 volt
customer_reviews.text: The fine print MUST be somew..... maybe not, anyway, this will not work on the most common electric, (240 volt) it only works with low voltage systems.
customer_reviews.author: RICH

customer_reviews.title: Join the future. Old man
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and setup. Too early to tell if it’ll have an impact on the bill but so far. The ability to monitor and control remotely has been great. Thinking about adding a sensor to a different are to see how it manages temps in different rooms. So far. Easier to schedule and control than the old digital thermostat. Dad approved.
customer_reviews.author: R*

customer_reviews.title: Missed it by that much....
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I’m giving 4 stars is because of the lack of a “hold” feature. All this fancy programming and eco mode and knowing when I’m home and not, yet they couldn’t put a simple function like “hold”. There are times when I want the unit to stay on 1 temperature, but that is not an available feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermostat. I rented a cabin in the woods during winter, and the cabin had this installed. I really liked the way it displayed the temp and the setting, and how well it worked. The one I had in my house would automatically click itself into economy mode right in the middle of the night and I would have to get up to reset the darn thing. This thins works like a charm.... and I can set it using my phone.
customer_reviews.author: John Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very good but not quite perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The nest itself is fine but the remote sensors don’t integrate with Alexa. Installation on a 4 wire single transformer system was smooth. It is a direct swap in for my old Honeywell digital thermostat. It would be a five star IF Alexa recognized the remote sensor we also purchased. The work around is to set the Nest to read the remote sensor vs. the main location.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Calusine

customer_reviews.title: No C wire needed.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome display does everything as advertised. I had one problem as do most, no C wire. I just switched my G wire on the thermostat and furnace to the C Wire. Everything works fine you just can't use your fan independently. Hope this works with your installation.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Love Nest!
customer_reviews.text: We love our best! This is the second one we have gotten. We also had the more expensive version and I can say that there aren't any big differences. I love how I can control everything from my phone and that it learns your patterns. We will have these in every home we own!
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Merriam

customer_reviews.title: will not replace previous Nests
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a replacement for a Nest generation 2. After a long installation, they changed the base again, I connected it to the internet but would not control the heat pump. It is half the price of the Nest but very particular in what it will control.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES E PARE

customer_reviews.title: Google Nest Thermostat E just like the full nest
customer_reviews.text: Very easy installation with the Nest app. I love love being able to control the temperature with out getting up. Works well with google mini. You can give it commands for this Nest and it will follow it. The installation was fairly simple if you just watch the youtube videos and the nest app. Make sure you take a picture of the wiring!
customer_reviews.author: Yuranys Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware, but needs some software improvements.
customer_reviews.text: App tends to default you back to whatever it feels the temp should be even if you made an adjustment 10 minutes prior and there isn’t a program running. Needs a manual mode that is easy to activate and it will not override. Also, I have a lot of timeout issues with the app.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Love that this connects to my Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know how much you can enjoy a thermostat, but I like that this connects to my Alexa. The only strange thing is the display. The number that shows up on the display is the temperature you set the thermostat, I would think that it would be the current temperature.
customer_reviews.author: A regular shopper

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit difficult for my AC guy to install. Does the job and saves energy. Used for my vacation Airbnb. Honestly I like the original more expensive version I have in my home as it is more intuitive. But for the price this gets the job done just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Best thermostat for an Hvac company owner
customer_reviews.text: As an owner of and HVAC company I always recommend Nest products. I use them for all new installs and it’s the only thermostat I recommend. Works great for all systems. A great way to save money for heat pumps with the heat pump balance feature.
customer_reviews.author: N. Benningfield

customer_reviews.title: Horrible device! Zero customer support
customer_reviews.text: Nest should write an update!!! When people are sequestered at home because of the coronavirus, you can’t stop the thermostat from changing!!! I wake up sweaty every night!!! Horrible device, absolutely no customer service!!! Do not buy!!! Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Thomas White

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Even when all features are turned off still auto adjust itself. Glitch in the nest software, countless hours spent with nest support being told to reset the nest and do the same things I've already tried to fix it. Worst customer support. Very sad loved my 1st generation nest. Waste of MONEY
customer_reviews.author: bre

customer_reviews.title: Love the Nest thermostats.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Nest thermostat E. I used this one upstairs, and a Nest model 3 downstairs. This allowed me to save some $$ on upstairs unit, and allowed control of built-in humidifier on 1st floor unit (the E won't handle the humidifier).
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps the only thermostat which is as easy to install as it seems in the Nest instruction ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely simplest thermostat to install. Perhaps the only thermostat which is as easy to install as it seems in the Nest instruction video. I was done installing and connecting it to wifi in about 20 minutes. It has been only a day so cam not write much about performance but it worked smoothly while I tried to turn heating on while away from home. The fact that it tells the current temperature inside home when you are away helps you to adjust heating or cooling when you are away. This helps in saving energy and energy bills.
customer_reviews.author: Jain Tushar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install which was my biggest fear. The instructions to take photo of exiting thermostat wires before disconnecting was a life saver. My old stat had an odd wire marker I would not have figured out on my own without the picture of old unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike J

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever got
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing I can even lock it so my kids can’t change the settings or can even have it so they can only go so high or low, I’m not a very book Savy person but a couple of YouTube videos and with the power off of course bingo it was up and running in no time the app is also extremely easy and can be paired with Alexa
customer_reviews.author: Jhonathan rymer

customer_reviews.title: Not everything it’s cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited to get this but had a lot of issues. Was having power issues and so connected a c wire hoping to resolve most of the issues. After that was connected still had issues with power to the r wire (everything was connected fine). On top of that, the temperature was consistently 3-5 warmer than on the original thermostat. So many issues and ended up just returning.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Saved over a hundred dollars since we installed it this year
customer_reviews.text: Our electric company does "peak hour" rates etc. The google nest is easy to schedule and adjust to optimize our house pre-cooling to survive being off during peak hours. It helps us see our usage and how we can adjust our thermostat better.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Escamilla

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Nest. I have programmed it so we hardly ever have to touch it. But I love that if we come home early or something I can get on the app to adjust the temperature and the house will be just right by the time we get home. Super easy to install and set up also.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Worked with no common wire.
customer_reviews.text: Even though I only had a 4 wire system (no common wire), it installed and worked instantly. The on screen prompts and instructions made it easy to setup and configure with my Wi-fi. I think the temperature swing may be a little too much, but I'll give it sime time... It might be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie D Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Easy, but please read instructions first because it will walk you through each step..
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can adjust the temperature at the house when we are not even there.. warm it up before we come home and leave it cool when we're not, or Visaversa. If I'm cold I can tap the phone app and warm it up without my husband even knowing I changed it.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene H. / in GA

customer_reviews.title: Free after rebate (Vermont)
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and install. Best part for me it was free after rebate in Vermont.
customer_reviews.author: Neverawin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermostat! It works great with Google home. I did not install it myself. We were actually having a new furnace installed. So the tech installed it for us.
customer_reviews.author: Alana F

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I get a yearly rebate and I am learning about our energy usage patterns. I am very happy with my purchase. It has definitely made me more aware of how much energy we use, I try to see how low I can get it each day lol
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great tech support
customer_reviews.text: Our house was wired weirdly and we had a very difficult time installing our Nest but tech support was great. We began to see a change immediately. We love that it’s programmable and we can operate it from our iPhones!
customer_reviews.author: L Mattay

customer_reviews.title: Great, inexpensive and blends into wall
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. They walk you through the wiring process. Just check that it is compatible with your system using their online compatibility checker before you Buy or Install it. Easy to program and use with our phones, Google hub as well as manually adjusting it on the wall. It blends into the wall vs the regular version and lights automatically when you walk up to it. We purchased this to use with the temperature pucks as our bedroom was getting hot at night because the thermostat is downstairs where it stays cooler. Perfect fix.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: The nest is the best
customer_reviews.text: I love my smart thermostat!! The nest is the best! We did have to call someone to help install because we are not super handy but not expensive at all and so worth it. I love that I can check my phone to check temp or change
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Perez

product_meta.title: Nest and Thermostat – Thermostat
feature_bullets: Use the Nest app to change the temperature from anywhere

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,307 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
